DOC.brief_summary: The investigator compare effectiveness two type chiropractic manipulation standard medical care patient recent onset low back pain . The two type chiropractic treatment compare hands-on ( manual ) manipulation mechanical-assisted ( Activator ) manipulation . The standard medical care consist medical examination prescription over-the-counter anti-inflammatory medication .
DOC.brief_title: Chiropractic Manipulation Medical Care Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Age : ≥ 18 year age Ability read write English Experiencing new episode low back pain ( LBP ) onset past 3 month Oswestry Disability Index score 2070 point ( 0100 scale ) Numeric pain rating score 38 point ( 010 scale ) Prior history lumbar spine surgery History unstable spondylolisthesis , spinal stenosis , scoliosis > 20° Signs symptom suggestive nerve root tension and/or neurological deficit lower extremity History metastatic cancer , osteoporosis , longterm corticosteroid use , red flag serious illness include follow : unexplained weight loss > 10 % body weight , spinal pain associate fever , severe night pain unrelieved medication Receiving physical therapy , chiropractic therapy , manual therapy episode LBP ( within past 3 month ) Receiving ongoing medical care episode low back pain Current use opiate prescription medication low back pain
